mapper.select: SELECT * FROM members WHERE sns_id = #{snsId} AND sns_type = #{snsType};
SELECT * FROM members WHERE nickname LIKE CONCAT(#{nickname}, '%') LIMIT 3

SELECT #{memberId} AS member_id, m.profile AS image_url, m.nickname, (f.id IS NOT NULL) AS is_following, m.self_introduction AS self_introduction, t.id AS tag_id, t.name AS tag_name FROM members m LEFT JOIN follow f ON f.followee_id = m.id AND f.follower_id = #{currentMemberId} LEFT JOIN members_tags mt ON mt.member_id = m.id LEFT JOIN tags t ON t.id = mt.tag_id WHERE m.id = #{memberId};
